name: MANIFEST
summary: This object is always avalible in default `MANIFEST` variable

subscribeEvent.summary: Subscribes script with provided name to provided event

unsubscribeEvent.summary: Unsubscribes script with provided name from provided event

clearEvent.summary: Unsubscribes all scripts from provided event

requireLibrary.summary: Reports exception in minecraft logs if provided library is not loaded and stops execution of this script.
